mods.abstract: Interview with Brad McMillan, an artist involved in the Evergreen News publication. McMillan a Rhodes College, formerly Southwestern, alumni created the layout and illustrations for the newsletter. McMillan talks about the culture of media and the importance of providing information. He mentions how crucial the newsletter was for the neighborhood, especially during a time of integration. This interview was conducted in 1979.
